job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and modification of machine learning models, specifically for large language models, which is a core aspect of the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase lists specific techniques (RAG, PEFT, LoRA) used for training and adapting LLMs, fitting within the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the practical application and deployment of ML algorithms into production-ready systems, a key part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with product management to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements, aligning with Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
job_tasks.justification: This describes the handling, cleaning, and preparation of data for machine learning, which falls under Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
job_tasks.justification: This task involves testing, validating, and improving machine learning models, which is integral to the Modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
job_tasks.justification: While also related to modeling, contributing to new algorithms and techniques implies foundational work that can include data aspects and is often driven by research into data representations and preprocessing.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software development practices aimed at ensuring the quality and longevity of code, fitting into the Software Development category.

soft_skills.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI
contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, fine-tuning, and deploying large language models, including specific techniques like RAG and PEFT. It also highlights building production-grade software systems around these models, which are the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
